title: Quantum Divide
imgSmText: Physicist risks time travel
imgText: A brilliant quantum physicist builds a device to leap through time, but each attempt warps his memories, forcing him to choose between saving the future or his sanity.

title: Worlds Apart
imgSmText: Travelers switch universes
imgText: A group of strangers discover they can jump between parallel universes, each switch revealing darker truths about themselves and the cost of escaping fate.

title: Dark Orbit
imgSmText: Murder on ISS by alien with evidemce being confusing at best
imgText: A murder shocks astronauts aboard the ISS, but evidence points to a hidden extraterrestrial life form stalking the crew in zero gravity.

title: Taken by the Sky
imgSmText: Chinese professor abducted
imgText: In Beijing, a university professor researching astrophysics is abducted by a UFO, sparking a mystery that shakes her students and colleagues.

title: Children of the Light
imgSmText: Documentary about UFO in Congo
imgText: Shot documentary-style, villagers and children recount a UFO sighting deep in the Congo, blending testimony with eerie visuals of the encounter.

title: Starlit Stranger
imgSmText: Alien falls for US teen girl
imgText: In 1950s America, a lonely teenage girl falls in love with an alien disguised as a boy, facing the paranoia of the Cold War and the purity of first love.

title: War for Titan
imgSmText: Rival troops fight for planet
imgText: Two rival space armies battle for control of Titan, their conflict escalating into a brutal war that may doom the planet they hope to conquer.

title: Breathless Earth
imgSmText: Alien plant threatens air
imgText: An invasive alien plant spreads across Earth, releasing spores that choke the atmosphere. Scientists race against time to destroy it before extinction.

title: Neural Horizon
imgSmText: AI dreams rewrite reality
imgText: When a new AI begins creating dreamscapes for human minds, people lose the ability to distinguish reality from illusion, sparking a global identity crisis.

title: Signal of Silence
imgSmText: Lost crew answers alien signal
imgText: A deep-space crew responds to a mysterious signal, only to discover it lures them toward a trap set by an ancient alien intelligence.

title: The Chronon Paradox
imgSmText: A physicist's time travel experiment goes horribly wrong.
imgText: A quantum physicist successfully creates a time bubble, but becomes trapped in a cascading series of temporal fractures, meeting past and future selves with disastrous consequences.

title: The Echo World
imgSmText: A group discovers they can consciously shift between parallel realities.
imgText: A secret society navigates the delicate web of parallel worlds, but their actions begin causing catastrophic reality collapses, forcing them to fix the multiverse they broke.

title: Orbit of Deceit
imgSmText: A murder on the ISS reveals a shapeshifting alien stowaway.
imgText: The crew of the International Space Station must identify a killer among them, unaware the murderer is an extraterrestrial entity that can mimic any one of them perfectly.

title: The Star Bridge
imgSmText: A Chinese professor is abducted and shown the universe's truth.
imgText: A brilliant but skeptical astrophysics professor in Beijing is taken by a benign alien race. She returns with knowledge that could advance humanity or destroy its sense of place in the cosmos.

title: The Kilembi Lights
imgSmText: A documentary crew investigates a mass UFO sighting by children.
imgText: Decades after the event, filmmakers interview the now-adult witnesses of a mysterious UFO sighting at a remote missionary school, uncovering a truth more profound than anyone imagined.

title: Stardust and Saddle Shoes
imgSmText: A 1950s teen falls for a stranded alien hiding in her small town.
imgText: In 1956, a typical high school girl discovers her new crush is an alien whose ship crashed nearby. They must hide his identity from government agents and her suspicious town.

title: The Ceres Conflict
imgSmText: Two rival corporate space marines battle for control of a dwarf planet.
imgText: In the 23rd century, profit-driven military corporations fight a proxy war on the mineral-rich Ceres. A soldier from each side must choose between orders and survival when a greater threat emerges.

title: Oxygen Thief
imgSmText: A beautiful but deadly alien plant begins consuming Earth's atmosphere.
imgText: A mysterious moss, brought back from a deep-space probe, grows at an exponential rate, releasing a gas that displaces oxygen. Scientists race to stop it before the world suffocates.

title: The Silence of Proxima
imgSmText: A generation ship arrives at Proxima Centauri to find it eerily empty.
imgText: After a centuries-long journey, the crew awakens to find their promised new home world perfectly habitable but completely devoid of any life, including the robotic probes sent ahead.

title: The Last Archive
imgSmText: An AI must guide the last human child across a post-apocalyptic Earth.
imgText: Centuries after a nano-swarm catastrophe, a custodial AI discovers a single surviving human child. Together, they embark on a perilous journey to a rumored sanctuary, evading rogue machines.
